sentences.en: According to the computer model, this design could increase wind farm efficiency a hundredfold. The next step for the researchers is to do a field test, trying out these fish dynamics on dry land.
sentences.cn: 根据计算机模型得出的结果，这种设计可以让风力发电厂效率提高数百倍，下一步就是研究人员的现场测试，看“鱼儿”在陆地上的“游动”。

sentences.en: And Isaac sowed in that land andin the same year a hundredfold And Jehovah blessed him.
sentences.cn: 以撒在那地区播种,那一年丰收百倍,因为上主赐福给他.

sentences.en: And Isaac sowed in that land, and reaped in the same year a hundredfold.
sentences.cn: 以撒在那地耕种, 那一年有百倍的收成.

sentences.en: And other fell on good ground, and sprang up, and bare fruit an hundredfold.
sentences.cn: 8又有落在好土里的, 生长起来, 结实百倍.

sentences.en: As long as there’s hope that the front line, who must rescue efforts to hundredfold, from the ruins in search for possible survivors, from under collapsed buildings in a rescue every life.
sentences.cn: 只要有一线的希望，救援者就必须以百倍的努力，从废墟中寻找可能的生还者，从正在倒塌的建筑物中抢救出每一个生命。

sentences.en: But others fell on good ground and yielded a: some a hundredfold some sixty, some thirty.
sentences.cn: 8又有落在好土里的,就结实,有一百倍的,有六十倍的, 有三十倍的.

sentences.en: From now on Gerui people would like to create infinite possibility with a hundredfold efforts.
sentences.cn: 今后,格锐人将以百倍的努力,创造无限可能.

sentences.en: In setting my goals I will consider my best performance of the past andit a hundredfold.
sentences.cn: 在制定目标的时候,不妨参考过去最好的成绩,使其发扬光大.

sentences.en: Multiply these a hundredfold, ten times, and they will feed all the cities of the earth.
sentences.cn: 再把这些麦苗增加数倍, 如此数十次, 它们可以供养世上所有的城市.

sentences.en: Other seeds fell on good soil and brought grain , some a hundredfold, some sixty, some thirty.
sentences.cn: 又有落在好土里的,就结出实来, 有一百倍的, 有六十倍的, 有三十倍的.

sentences.en: Take cocaine: the mark - up between coca field and consumer is more than a hundredfold.
sentences.cn: 以可卡因为例: 可卡田里和消费者之间的差价高达上百倍.

sentences.en: The eminent writers duly propose a huge (nay, hundredfold) boost in funding to help the poor cope with a shifting climate—through drought-resistant crops, for example.
sentences.cn: 许多著名的作家适时地提出了一个大量（不仅如此，百倍的）增加资金帮助那些穷人应对一个正在转变的气候——例如，通过抗旱作物。
他们的钱增加了一百倍.
